content.title: Agroforestry component under RKVY
content.department: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
content.details: In 2023-24, the scheme was restructured as an Agroforestry component under Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY) and focusses on Quality Planting Material. Under the scheme, financial assistance is being provided to the beneficiaries for establishment of nurseries and raising of saplings. The scheme shall promote the setting up of new small, medium and hi-tech nurseries for producing Quality Planting Materials (QPM).
benefits: Adaptation to impact of climate change effects through microclimate moderation, conservation of natural resources and creation of an additional source of livelihood and income opportunities.
Enhancement in productivity, soil fertility improvement, soil conservation, nutrient cycling, microclimate improvement etc.
Enhanced carbon sequestration in farmlands as well as ecosystem services.
Sustainable availability of Quality Planting Material for agroforestry.

Promote the setting up of new small, medium and hi-tech nurseries for producing Quality Planting Materials (QPM) like seeds, seedlings, clones, and improved varieties to meet the requirement of farmers.
eligibility: All farmers of the State & Union Territory are eligible to take the benefits of this scheme.
content.application_process: Offline. Proposals can be submitted to States. The State Government will examine the project proposal from the viewpoint of suitability to the priorities and objectives of the State and the general framework of RKVY.

faqs.question: What is the core purpose of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, financial assistance is being provided to the beneficiaries for establishment of nurseries and raising of saplings.

faqs.question: How will Quality Planting Material be made available?
faqs.answer: QPM raised under the scheme shall be made available for farmers/SHGs.

faqs.question: Which is the nodal agency in the scheme?
faqs.answer: State government shall be the nodal agency for providing technical support, capacity building, setting up of nurseries, production, and certification of QPM etc.

faqs.question: Is there any maximum age limit for the applicant?
faqs.answer: There is no maximum age limit. however, the applicant should not be a minor.

faqs.question: Is there any application fee?
faqs.answer: No. The entire application process is completely free of cost.
